# Question

Write a function `timezone_bumper(dt,bump)` that increases any provided timestamp by `bump::Int` hours (defaults to +3 hours). Make sure it works only for DateTime types and throws an error for Date types.

## Example

```julia
julia> dt = DateTime(2016,7,14,12,0,0)
2016-07-14T12:00:00

julia> timezone_bumper(dt)  # should be same as adding 3 hours to dt
2016-07-14T15:00:00

julia> timezone_bumper(dt,2) # should add 2 hours instead of the default 3 hours.
2016-07-14T14:00:00
```
